belongs_to_collection.name: He's a Woman, She's a Man (Collection)

overview: Wing is a devoted fan of popular singer Rose who is involved in a topsy-turvy relationship with her charismatic producer Sam. Willing to go to any length to meet Rose, the willowy Wing disguises herself as a man, and with a twist of fate is chosen to be the next budding star for the record company.
title: He's a Woman, She's a Man
